sentences.sContent: Cuts in food prices will be offset by direct payments to farmers.
sentences.sCn: 食品降价将通过直接付款给农民的方式进行补偿。

sentences.sContent: ...Critics say Congress will give in to lobbyists and let inefficient providers off the hook That is far less likely to happen if Congress also adopts strong "pay-go" rules requiring that any increase in payments to providers be offset by new taxes or budget cuts...

synos.tran: 抵消，补偿；平版印刷；支管
抵消；弥补；用平版印刷术印刷

phrases.pCn: 胶印，平版印刷；胶版印刷；平板印刷
胶版纸；胶版印刷纸；平版机上浆纸
偏移电压；[光电]补偿电压
偏移曲面（设计软件3D MAX中的一个选项）
橡皮印刷机；胶版印刷机

remMethod.val: 来自词组set off 抵消

trans.tranOther: if the cost or amount of something offsets another cost or amount, the two things have an opposite effect so that the situation remains the same
